title: Kialara
author: Kialara
created_time: August 05, 2023, 12:02:45 AMLast edit: August 08, 2023, 04:03:06 AM by Kialara
content: Hello, everyone!Here is a thread dedicated to all things Guardians! You can find more information at: https://kialara.com/product/guardians/Each Guardian sent out comes with an entirely distinct Avatar, a one-of-one, carefully crafted using advanced deep-learning AI technology. While you have the freedom to choose your desired element, the actual character you get will be a delightful surprise.I encourage you all to share your Guardians here, and I'm certain others would love to see them too. In terms of funding or 'loading' your Guardians, feel free to share tips and methods in this thread. However, please note that generating keys safely is a topic of varied opinions, and I'd prefer to avoid getting involved in that discussion. Nevertheless, if you plan on using a site like bitaddress.org, ensure you're on the correct site and not a copycat scam site. Additionally, it‚Äôs a good idea to take your computer offline (air gap), especially when dealing with significant amounts.

comments.author: Kialara
comments.created_time: August 05, 2023, 12:02:57 AMLast edit: August 22, 2023, 07:25:13 AM by Kialara
comments.body: To participate in the Sapphire Builder giveaway, simply share a photo of your Guardian in this thread. By doing so, you will be entered for a chance to win! One entry per unique Guardian image submitted.Entries:ChiBitCTy: IISuzuki Matt: IMoparMiningLLC: IIIIminerjones: IIIISteeley: IIIIIIMarkzellers: IHox: IIav8rjeff: IIIICapWillard: IIIIIshadallion: Iheisty: IIIIBox Guy: IVerndog: IIIIFUTUR3: ISaigoLives: IIIIZuruduba: IIgreentailedlemur: IIAnd entries granted to those with packages stuck in customs: (images to come) Mortare: IIII Honeybadger2014: IIIIK.O. (forum name requested today): IIIIThe winner will be selected through a random drawing, and there is a tentative plan to utilize the blockchain for transparency. The block number(s) and submission end date/time will be announced by the end of this week. Numbers/Characters will be randomly assigned. Depending on the level of participation, there may be multiple drawings to narrow down the participants to a select few before the final drawing takes place.

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Figured I‚Äôd kick this off with my emerald Guardian (plan to purchase the diamond version soon).

comments.author: Kialara
comments.body: Thanks for sharing, Chi! I was thinking last night and decided that I'm going to raffle off a Sapphire Builder and anyone who shares a photo of their Guardian will be entered. Multiple Guardians = multiple 'tickets'. So consider your post as 1 ticket into the raffle. I'll come back this evening or tomorrow to share more details.

comments.body: I still havent assembled it yet. Not sure if I will. Im still undecided. But definitely cool pieces. This isnt my favorite image. But I love the otherside.[Imgur](https://imgur.com/8N7P11g)

comments.body: Chi, Suzuki Mopar & mj, thank you for sharing! I've updated the first comment ^ with some more info and a tally of the entries.

comments.body: Here is the one I am proud to own! Thanks again for all of your contributions to the Bitcoin world of art, this is my 3rd piece and I look forward to more in the future!

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Funky collection. If I find the time this weekend, would like to compile the submitted images into some sort of summary-graphic, just to show the different types for the four elements next to each other.Ofc if anyone wants to do this in the meantime, feel free! Oh and that's an insane giveaway, a Builder.
